project_info.theme_description: A fusion of bold pop art aesthetics with modernist sophistication, reimagined for the 22nd century. This collection explores the intersection of digital culture, sustainable futures, and timeless design principles.
project_info.color_philosophy: Vibrant neon hues balanced with soft pastels and clean neutrals, reflecting both optimistic futurism and organic harmony.

patterns.name: Digital Flora Matrix
patterns.concept: Pixelated botanical elements merge with organic growth patterns, representing the harmony between nature and technology in 2100.
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, pixelated flowers and leaves with glitch art effects, digital botanical motifs, 8-bit style blooms transitioning into organic shapes, continuous motif with geometric grid overlay, no borders, perfect repeat, modern pop art aesthetic, vibrant neon colors on clean background, technology meets nature theme
patterns.technical_notes: Half-drop repeat creates dynamic flow. Mix hard-edged pixels with soft organic transitions. Scale: medium allows versatility across garment types.

patterns.name: Holographic Geometry
patterns.concept: Clean modernist shapes with holographic iridescent effects, creating depth through color gradient overlays and optical illusions.
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, modernist geometric shapes with holographic rainbow gradients, overlapping circles squares and triangles, iridescent color shifts, continuous abstract composition, no borders, perfect repeat, bauhaus influence with futuristic twist, pastel gradients and neon accents, optical illusion depth effect
patterns.technical_notes: Straight repeat for clean alignment. Large scale creates bold statement pieces. Gradient transitions should appear seamless across tile edges.

patterns.name: Pop Culture Compression
patterns.concept: Abstract data visualization patterns inspired by compressed digital media, representing information overload in vibrant pop art colors.
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, abstract data streams and compression artifacts, glitch art horizontal lines and color blocks, digital noise patterns, continuous geometric abstraction, no borders, perfect repeat, inspired by jpeg compression and signal interference, bold contrasting colors, rhythmic vertical and horizontal elements
patterns.technical_notes: Brick/offset repeat creates visual rhythm. Small scale ideal for all-over prints and layering. High contrast for visual impact.

patterns.name: Biomorphic Circuit
patterns.concept: Organic cell-like structures interconnected like circuit boards, symbolizing bio-technology integration and sustainable innovation.
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, organic cell structures connected by circuit-like pathways, biomorphic shapes with technological connections, flowing curves and straight lines intersection, continuous biological-digital hybrid motif, no borders, perfect repeat, mid-century modern meets bio-tech, soft pastels with metallic accents, cellular network aesthetic
patterns.technical_notes: Half-drop creates organic flow while maintaining structure. Medium scale balances detail visibility with overall pattern. Curved elements should connect seamlessly across boundaries.

patterns.name: Neon Minimalism
patterns.concept: Ultra-simplified forms with maximum color impact, featuring bold neon shapes on clean backgrounds for a striking modernist statement.
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, bold minimalist shapes in neon colors, simple geometric forms like circles dots and lines, clean negative space composition, continuous minimal elements, no borders, perfect repeat, swiss design influence with neon pop colors, high contrast between vibrant shapes and white background, contemporary minimalist aesthetic
patterns.technical_notes: Straight repeat for precise alignment of minimal elements. Large scale with generous negative space. Sharp edges and clean color fills essential for impact.

production_guidelines.color_mode: RGB for digital, convertible to CMYK for print production
production_guidelines.repeat_testing: All patterns must tile perfectly in all directions with no visible seams
production_guidelines.scale_variations: Each pattern should be tested at multiple scales for different applications
production_guidelines.sustainability_note: Color palette optimized for eco-friendly reactive dyes and digital printing technologies available in 2100
